rules_text:
Whenever a land you control enters, create an Aether token. [i](It's an enchantment with “Sacrifice two Aether: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Flow – Sacrifice an Aether: Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand. [i](Each creature you tap while activating this pays for 1.)[/i]
